mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIL (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, TO_MAIL, FROM_MAIL, SEND_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.SEQ),0)+1 FROM MAIL A), #{title}, #{contents}, #{toMail}, #{fromMail}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, TO_MAIL, FROM_MAIL, TO_CHAR(SEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') AS SEND_DT FROM MAIL ORDER BY SEND_DT DESC
